name: Jacki Gonterman
text: Picked a large thin crust pizza with olives and green pepper. Doesn't  sound good but boy it tastes great.  Service was wonderful in Oscoda. Will try Howie rolls next.

name: Alex Van Elsacker
text: Consistently good. Only time we've ever had a problem they took care of it right away and threw in some extra food to make up for it. Excellent service.

name: HOUSE NGUYEN
text: I got some pizzas today for my movie party. Deep dish, veggie, and stuffed crust pizza. The pizzas are always good. Never had a bad experience with them. They offer different flavored crust also, I got ranch and onions. They remind me when i used to live in the city, pizza hut.

name: Curtis Wilburn
text: I got a Mowie Wowie, and the pizza was phenomenally delicious. The dining area was super clean, and uncrowded, as well. All together, a nice little meal.

name: Iron Burd
text: The family likes this place. Their onion garlic flavored crust is good and the steak n cheese sub was the best sub I ever had. The bread was made from pizza dough I guess instead of a hoagie or a submarine.

name: KLS 505
text: Friendly service. Much more extensive menu than expected. Nice decor!

name: Caleb the Mechanic at Radio Free Catholic
text: My favorite pizza spot outside of New York City!

name: Chris Martin
text: I didn't get the pizza I ordered today but they're usually good

name: Steve Forbes
text: Good pizza! My only complaint would be that when we picked up the pizza the staff member seemed more interested in talking with fellow employees than assisting us. Would still give it another shot though.

name: Carol Compian
text: My son Carlos said another fine pizza from hungry howies today...

name: Corey Lahey
text: Really love the pepperoni

name: Amanda Bradley
text: Terrible! Waited 20 minutes over what they said wait time was. When I finally get my food it was wrong for one and dull and tasteless but I was already home so needless to say I paid to throw it away! So disappointed üòû

name: Ronnie Skicko
text: Takes forever to get your food, don't matter if you try to have it delivered or try to pick it up.

name: Aaron Ransom
text: Basing my experience on many orders having lived in town for over a year. For pickup, my orders have always been ready quickly (under 20min) and made correctly. I always use the app for ordering so that may have something to do with ‚Ä¶More

name: Olivia Clapp
text: I ordered a grilled chicken and tomato with asiago crust online. What I got was grilled chicken  with bacon, couple pieces of sausage, a white sauce and sesame crust. Didnt look at it till we got home. By the time we got home it wasnt going ‚Ä¶More

text: I love the pizza l, especially the crust. The Howie bread and salad is also very good.

name: erick martin
text: Decent pizza for the price

name: Kelly Thomas
text: Nicole is the best she made my pizza so good.

name: Daniel Roycroft
text: Charge individual delivery fees when delivering 20 pizzas to one location.

name: Tracey G
text: Great pizza with decent prices.

name: Real Roses MSP
text: Josh, I couldn't agree more with you. We use to love this pizza until recently. I ordered during a memorial day party and everyone was disappointed . The pizza lacked sauce and cheese and was overdone. The BBQ chicken pizza had no chicken ‚Ä¶More

name: chad carpenter
text: Great management,Matt was lovely I took to long picking up and they asked ME if they could make a new pizza, just shocking to have such thoughtful service. Great ppl!

name: Janet Stoley
text: Delivery driver decided to give himself a 10.00 tip on my credit card. Food was fine though.

name: Gavin Mooney
text: So I hadn‚Äôt had HH pizza in some years. My in-laws picked up some pies and they were fresh and tasty. The next day all hell broke loose. I have never had a more negative reaction to a pizza (Currently on the toilet writing this review). ‚Ä¶More

name: G Slocombe
text: Fairly standard for Hungry Howies. Pizza was pretty greasy, but it was edible.

name: Shauna Jennings
text: They have been great with fast delivery and great service when we ate in as well. Tasty flavored crust and they pile on the toppings which we love.

name: Josh H
text: I used to like this place until recently.  Never had a problem up until 2 weeks ago.  I ordered my food, went to pick it up at scheduled time and I had to wait an extra 30 min.  Finally got the food and it was horrible, cold.  You could ‚Ä¶More

name: Louie Kincaid
text: Fast n friendly service n great pizza!!

name: Dave Schmits
text: Two hours for delivery? Not me! I understand being busy, but they were not! Called 3 times! Should be called Starving Howie's!!üò† I recommend Mancino's north of town.

name: Adrion Shubert
text: Usually get good service but just last week ordered a pizza and it was delivered with the wrong topping so i called the stire they said they would give me a free pizza so i was like ok cool but tried to get the pizza today and they have no record of my order and that i havent ordered in sence march .For that they suck

name: Scott fleming
text: Pretty good pizza and great service

name: Ashley Fandel
text: The food is not bad. The staff and customer service is absolute garbage. Waited 4 hours for them to deliver some breadsticks, called multiple times and NEVER had the food show up.

name: Jessica Caraher
text: Don't really care for their pizza sauce, but they have some pretty good speciality pizzas.

name: Damian Parent
text: Very good gotta try it now !!

name: Stacy Drake
text: We order pizza in oscoda, we our regular in Holly Michigan and clarkston. At 8 41 pm called at 9:20 no pizza. The man said there was no way to contact the driver. He said your pizza will be there. Nope it wasn‚Äôt. Called back they said it was delivered!nope it hasn‚Äôt. Hungry kids thanks hungry homies. I was a valued customer

name: JCBeats.
text: Best Crust, Only place with so many options! Fun and friendly service. üçïü§™ #oscodaoriginal

name: milford fowler
text: Service was slow, waited 40 mins for a small two item pizza and a calzone.  The food was horrible and so was the service......

name: Nick Revitzer
text: Good place.  I've always enjoyed hungry Howie's. It's getting a little pricy, but you can always find coupons.

name: jim degase
text: Buffett is a great idea for lunch. Good prices good food.

name: Brandon Shafto
text: Ordered online, picked up hot pizza done right in 20 minutes with great customer service.

name: Sharlene Hill
text: Wasn't as good as normal. Asked to not over cook the cinnamon bread and they did.

name: Tim Condo
text: Delivery times are hit or miss. sometimes reasonable within a half hour other times an hour and a half. They make a lot of mistakes and the dining area never seems to be clean. I would avoid this Howie's

name: Joshua Woody
text: They don't deliver before or at 11am even though most people are having work break then.  Take your money to someone willing to work for it.

name: Tidbit Npapa
text: Was good until recently.  The one older Lady who is a manager shouldn't be going of on customers in front of customers.

text: One of the best times having the buffet February 6. The crew kept the buffet hot and full.
